meanings.definition: A person or thing whose name one has forgotten or does not know.
meanings.sent1: I saw a whosits at the store, but I couldn't remember their name.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked about the whosits who borrowed her book.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a detective trying to solve the mystery of the whosits.
meanings.sent4: The whosits in the photo album brought back memories of forgotten faces.
meanings.sent5: The whosits in the story remained a mystery till the end.

meanings.definition: Used to refer to someone or something whose name is either unknown or forgotten.
meanings.sent1: Whosits left their umbrella at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: I found a note signed by whosits in the lost and found box.
meanings.sent3: Whosits must have a great sense of humor to leave such funny messages.
meanings.sent4: The box was full of secrets, each one belonging to a different whosits.
meanings.sent5: Whosits always seems to be the one who brings surprises to the group.
